text: The Juraj Dobrila University of Pula () is a university in the city of Pula, Croatia. It was created in 2006. As of 2011, the university had about 2,465 students. ==Faculties and Departments== The Juraj Dobrila University of Pula is an entirely integrated university, consisting of five departments: * Faculty of Economics and Tourism "Dr. Mijo MirkoviÄ‡" * Department of Humanities * Department of Information Technology * Department of Music * Department for Studies in the Italian Language * Teacher training department ==References== == Other websites == * University of Pula website Category:Colleges and universities in Croatia Category:2006 establishments in Europe Category:Pula
title: Juraj Dobrila University of Pula
